name: Pew Pew Dadu
description:
This is my entry to GMTK Game Jam 2022.

 Play as a Dice who can shoot!

Survive as long as you can while collecting coins to earn score.

Controls:

NumPad keys = move Dadu

Z = Jumps

X = Shoots (shooting pattern depends on shown number)

Enter = Pause or confirm

F8 = Take screenshot

Features:

- 8 directional shooting.

- Jumping, falling and knocked away will roll the Dice and changes shown number.

- Endless game with increasing number of enemies.

- Cool soundtracks!

Enjoy this endless shooter game!
